front.title: Zstandard Compression and The application/zstd Media Type

abstract.t: Zstandard, or "zstd" (pronounced "zee standard"), is a data compression mechanism. This document describes the mechanism, and registers a media type to be used when transporting zstd-compressed via Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions (MIME). Despite use of the word "standard" as part of its name, readers are advised that this document is not an Internet Standards Track specification, and is being published for informational purposes only.
